attemptNumber.description: The attempt number of the delivery.

attemptTime.description: The time that the delivery was attempted.

Attempt.description: Details of an attempt of delivery.

detailedMessage.description: The detailed message from attempting to deliver the message.

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the notification

plainTextBody.description: The plain text body of the email

htmlBody.description: The HTML body of the email (if any)

CreateEmailNotification.description: The information required to create a notification which, when processed, will send an email

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the notification

recipients.description: The phone numbers to which the SMS will be sent to (E.164 format)

CreateSmsNotification.description: The information required to create a notification which, when processed, will send an SMS

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the subscription

status.description: The current status of the subscription. Possible values are: Active, Inactive

CreateSubscription.description: The information required to create a subscription

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the notification

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method such as GET, POST, etc. to use on the request

url.description: The URL to send the request to

authenticationType.description: The type of authentication to use on the request

authenticationConfigurationItemPaths.description:
The paths of the Configuration Store configuration items that contain the authentication configuration. Each
authentication type requires different keys:
- Lusid - None required
- BasicAuth - Requires 'Username' and 'Password'
- BearerToken - Requires 'BearerToken'
            
e.g. the following would be valid assuming that the config is present in the configuration store at the
specified paths:
            
    "authenticationType": "BasicAuth",
    "authenticationConfigurationItemPaths": {
        "Username": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminUser",
        "Password": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminPassword"
    }

contentType.description: The type of the content e.g. Json

CreateWebhookNotification.description: The information required to create a notification which, when processed, will trigger a webhook

eventId.description: The identifier of the associated event.

notificationId.description: The identifier of the associated notification.

deliveryChannel.description: The delivery channel of the message.

messageDetails.description: The Details of the delivery message as JSON string.

attempts.description: A list of all the delivery attempts made for this message.

id.description: The identifier of the event type

entity.description: The entity against which the event originated

application.description: The application associated with the event

eventType.description: The type of event to subscribe to. Possible values are: Finbourne.Notifications.WebApi.Dtos.MatchingPattern.EventType

filter.description: A filter on the event. See https://support.lusid.com/filtering-results-from-lusid for more information. If not provided, all events will be matched

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the notification

deliveryChannel.description: The medium through which the notification is delivered

createdAt.description: The time at which the subscription was made

createdBy.description: The user who made the subscription

lastModifiedAt.description: The time at which the subscription was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the subscription

lastUpdated.description: The time at which the notification status was last updated

NotificationStatus.description: The status object of a notification

status.description: The current status of the subscription

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the subscription

status.description: The current status of the subscription

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the subscription

UpdateEmailNotification.description: The information required to update an Email notification

recipients.description: The phone numbers to which the SMS will be sent to (E.164 format)

UpdateSmsNotification.description: The information required to update an SMS notification

status.description: The current status of the subscription. Possible values are: Active, Inactive

UpdateSubscription.description: The information required to update a subscription

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method such as GET, POST, etc. to use on the request

url.description: The URL to send the request to

authenticationType.description: The type of authentication to use on the request

authenticationConfigurationItemPaths.description:
The paths of the Configuration Store configuration items that contain the authentication configuration. Each
authentication type requires different keys:
- Lusid - None required
- BasicAuth - Requires 'Username' and 'Password'
- BearerToken - Requires 'BearerToken'
            
e.g. the following would be valid assuming that the config is present in the configuration store at the
specified paths:
            
    "authenticationType": "BasicAuth",
    "authenticationConfigurationItemPaths": {
        "Username": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminUser",
        "Password": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminPassword"
    }
